It was not the streets that made the process of impeachment. It is indelibly marked in it all the digital of Eduardo Cunha #Democracy
The Brazilian economy has a robustness that neither the Ministry of Finance of the interim government puts in question #Democracy
It is not possible to discard all the achievements we have had in recent times. #Democracy
When, on being recorded, Senator Jucá said "Michel é Cunha", he meant that the deputy was part of the group of the former mayor of the House #Democracy
The emergence and hegemony of Eduardo Cunha was something very serious. Respect all those of the PMDB who always fought #Democracy
Brazil will need a supra-party government in which several parties share management. #Democracy
It is fundamental, in this moment of threat of democratic rupture, to resort to the popular plebiscite #Democracy
We must remember that, in order to reconstruct, it must be clear that what unites us is Brazil #Democracy
It is not respect for the ritual that characterizes the fulfillment of the legal process. It is necessary that the content respects the Constitution. #Democracy
We are not in parliamentarism, that enough the distrust of the head of government to remove it #Democracy
We are in a constitutional process in which, to condemn the president, there must be a crime of responsibility. #Democracy
If I suffer a conviction without crime, we will be living a very hard time for the Brazilian political system #Democracy
Votes ñ are from Michel Temer, were obtained by me. If I had committed a crime, they would go to the vice. But that was not so. It's blow #Democracy
I was delighted George Wright became Nat Sec when I was PM. Sorry to see him go. Campaign leader extraordinaire.  Mates always - JG.
This type of politicization can not be admitted in the face of the crisis. It's irresponsibility with the Brazilian people #Democracy
And the crisis is not over, no. If you do not have a serious attitude in 2016, it will still continue #Democracy
It is not possible to have, from now on, any fundamentalist position in relation to public accounts #Democracy
We have enough maturity to overcome this process. It is serious to remove a president without crime of responsibility #Democracy
I ask the senators to be aware when it comes to evaluating this process #Democracy

Follow the demonstration by President Dilma after approval of the parliamentary coup https://t.co/ffR38fLDer #LutarSempre
Today, @SenadoFederal has made a decision that goes into the history of the great injustices #LutarSempre
Senators who voted for impeachment chose to tear up the Federal Constitution #LutarSempre
Decided to interrupt the mandate of a President who did not commit a crime of responsibility
They condemned an innocent woman and consummated a parliamentary coup. #Always fight
C / the approval of the withdrawal, politicians seeking to escape the arm of Justice will take power united to the defeated in the election #LutarSempre
They do not ascend to the government by direct vote, as me and @LapapeloBrasil. They seize power by means of a coup d'état #LutarSempre
It's the second coup I face in life #LutarSempre
The 1st, the military coup, based on the truculence of arms, repression and torture, hit me when I was a young militant. #Always fight
The 2nd, the parliamentary coup delivered today by means of a juridical farce, brings me down from the position for which I was elected by the people #LutarSempre
It is an unequivocal indirect election, in which 61 senators replace the expressed will by 54.5 million votes #LutarSempre
It is a fraud, against which we will still resort in every possible instance. #Always fight
It is astounding that the greatest action against the corruption of our history leads precisely to the power of a group of corrupt investigated. #Always fight
Progressive, inclusive and democratic national project that I represent is interrupted by conservative and reactionary force #LutarSempre
The progressive national project that I represent is interrupted by a powerful reactionary force, with support of the factional press. #LutarSempre
They will capture the institutions of the State to put them at the service of the most radical economic liberalism and social retrogression #LutarSempre
They end up overthrowing the 1st woman president of Brazil, without any constitutional justification for this impeachment #LutarSempre
But the coup was not only committed against me and against my party. This was just the beginning.
The coup is against the social and union movements and against those who fight for rights in all its meanings #LutarSempre
The coup is against the people and the Nation. It's misogynist. It's homophobic. You're racist. It is the imposition of intolerance, prejudice, violence #LutarSempre
I ask Brazilians and Brazilians to listen to me. I speak to more than 54 mi who voted for me in 2014. #LutarSempre
I speak mainly to the Brazilians who, during my government, overcame misery, realized the dream of the house itself ... #LutarSempre
... ceased to be invisible to the eyes of the Nation, to have rights that were always denied them. #Always fight
The disbelief and heartache that hit us at times like this are terrible counselors. Do not give up the fight #LutarSempre
Listen well: they think they beat us, but they're wrong #LutarSempre
I know we're all going to fight. There will be against them the most firm, relentless and energetic opposition that a coup government can suffer. #Always fight
When the pres @ LulapeloBrasil was elected for the first time, we came to the government singing together that no one should be afraid of being happy. #Always fight
For more than 13 years, we have achieved a successful project that has promoted greater social inclusion and reduction of inequalities in history. #Always fight
We will be back. We will return to continue our journey towards a Brazil in which the people are sovereign. #Always fight
I hope we know how to unite in defense of causes common to all progressives #LutarSempre
I leave the Presidency as I entered: without having incurred in any illicit act; without betraying any of my commitments #LutarSempre
C / dignity and carrying in the chest the most love and admiration for Brazilians and Brazilians and the will to fight for Brazil #LutarSempre
I have lived my truth. I gave the best of my ability. I did not escape my responsibilities #LutarSempre
I was moved by human suffering, I moved in the fight against poverty and hunger, I fought inequality #LutarSempre
I had a good fight. I lost some, I won many and I was inspired by Darcy Ribeiro to say #LutarSempre
I would not want to be in the place of those who think they are overcomers. The story will be relentless with them #LutarSempre
To the Brazilian women, who covered me with flowers and affection, I ask you to believe that you can #LutarSempre
Future generations will know that in the first time a woman took the presidency, machismo and misogyny showed their ugly faces #LutarSempre
We have opened a one-way path towards gender equality. Nothing will bring us back. #Always fight
At this moment, I will not say goodbye to you. I'm sure I can say "see you later". #Always fight
I, from now on, will fight, tirelessly to build a better Brazil
I close sharing with you a beautiful breath of the Russian poet Mayakovsky #LutarSempre
"We're not happy, that's right / But why should we be sad? The sea of ​​history is agitated #LutarSempre
"Threats and wars, we will cross them, Break them in half, Cut them like a short keel." #Always fight
A loving embrace to all Brazilian people, who share with me the belief in democracy and the dream of justice #LutarSempre
